commandDescription: Utlises SemVer incrementation to update package versions using the Major, Minor, Patch syntax in the sfdx-project.json. Command must be used with either the --package flag to update one package or --allpackages flag to update all packages via the inquirer experience
dependenciesDescription: If a package version is updated, automatically update the package version in dependant packages dependencies. If this flag is not specified, the user will be asked if they want to update dependents
versionDescription:
The version to update using SemVer versioning
Options:
Major: when you make incompatible API changes
 Minor: when you add functionality in a backwards compatible manner
 Patch: when you make backwards compatible bug fixes.
packageDescription: Specific package name to be update. Can be used with --version flag
